item.title: Emailvision – whose the Dummy? or didn’t someone test your email campaign?
item.description: Social CRM for dummies is something I’ve wanted to read for sometime … it could be a good e-book … if the email marketing campaign worked. This shows the number one problem with integrated social media marketing – broken links. Emailvision are big news, they put the power into sites like http://alltop.com/ aka Guy Kawasaki … I’d like to learn more about them. Check your campaign experience works end to end Facebook fails with broken links and images.

item.title: Google Wave will it change SMS Texting and Instant Messaging
item.description: Will Google Wave change SMS texting and instant messaging? Most likely … but that’s about the best answer right now. Google will have to find partners to help ‘aggregate’ chat and email and address Internet infrastructure issues in a number of countries. Thanks to Googles reach, Wave can launch and get a good penetration into its addressable Gmail base. It’s all looking good with a Public Beta? of 100,000 invites due to be sent out in September.
